email_body:
Dear Patricia,

I hope this email finds you well. I am reaching out to you regarding an urgent security update that requires your immediate attention.

As the DevOps engineer at SafeSecurity, you play a critical role in ensuring the security and stability of our organization's systems. We have recently identified a potential vulnerability that could compromise our network and data.

To address this issue effectively, we have implemented a new security protocol that requires all employees to update their account credentials. This update is mandatory and must be completed by [DATE].

To proceed with the update, please click on the following link: here.

Please note that failure to update your credentials within the given timeframe may result in temporary account suspension.

If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to me or the IT department.

We appreciate your prompt attention to this matter.

Best regards,

[Sender Name]
